thread.title: 6 times Alia Bhatt let her clothes do the talking | Celebrity Style
thread.title_full: 6 times Alia Bhatt let her clothes do the talking | Celebrity Style - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 6 times Alia Bhatt let her clothes do the talking | Celebrity Style
text:
Alia Bhatt has got a pretty quirky sense of style, and an enviable collection of outfits that speak for her...yeah, literally! She knows how to pull off a casual-yet-chic look effortlessly, and say what's going on in her mind with style. Here are the top six looks of the actor when she made bold statements without saying a word.
1. This is how she combines sarcasm with style, and look effing gorgeous.
I speak fluent sarcasm! #KapoorAndSons #KNSMarch18th styled by @stylebyami hair by my lovely @ayeshadevitre make up by the sweetest @uday101 @shnoy09 @sajzdot
A post shared by Alia ‚ú®‚≠êÔ∏è (@aliaabhatt) on Mar 13, 2016 at 7:39am PDT
2. Comfy and cute, Alia looks like the girl-next-door in this outfit.
No error here! And what an amazing performance! @aliaabhatt in @ilkbysgva and @aldo_shoes
A post shared by Ami Patel (@stylebyami) on Sep 11, 2015 at 12:31am PDT
3. Alia pulls off a short suit with a slogan tee. The result? Be prepared for some major shopping goals!
@aliaabhatt in @kanikagoyallabel #bugginout #theshortsuit #shaandaar #ShaandaarDiaries #fashiondiaries #style #instastyle
A post shared by Ami Patel (@stylebyami) on Oct 2, 2015 at 10:39am PDT
4. We wonder, who's she refering to in this tee? No hard feelings for...?
Nautical inspired @aliaabhatt in @hm and @topshop #nohardfeelings #shaandaar #ShaandaarDiaries #style #stylefile #BollywoodFashion
A post shared by Ami Patel (@stylebyami) on Oct 4, 2015 at 8:27am PDT
5. Alia dresses for herself, and we love this about her!
Want to eat her up üçìüçïüçîüçâ @aliaabhatt in @hm and @adidasoriginals #shaandaar #promotions #wierdo #monochrome #stripes
A post shared by Ami Patel (@stylebyami) on Oct 12, 2015 at 10:57am PDT
6. Being patriotic in the most stylish way possible. We are just crushing over this look!
V-A-L-I-A-N-T ALIA üëäüèº @aliaabhatt in a custom @nikhilthampi jacket for the @ndtv #jaijawan shoot at the Wagha border. Styled with @shnoy09 @miloni_s91 hair: @ayeshadevitre up: @uday104 @grish1234
A post shared by Ami Patel (@stylebyami) on Aug 12, 2016 at 1:21am PDT
